DRAPER
(CIRCLING) A downright robber? That’s
what you are. Say? Am I going to be
paid?
PIERRE
For what? Is your mind wandering? Who
do you think I am? £I was wondering who
you took me for. j Pi ^•
.—
DRAPER
It’s you? You? And nobody else?
(STARTS TO LEAVE) I’m going to have a
look at your house, to see whether you
are there. If you’re there, there’s no
use in our worrying our heads about it
any longer.
PIERRE
Now you have it. That is the way to
find out.
DRAPER
Baa...uh...Pah? (EXITS)
PIERRE
(SMILING TURNS TO SHEPHERD) Say,
Lambkin? (BECKONING) Come hither.
Come, j Was thy business well done?
(SHEPHERD DOES NOT MOVE) (PIERRE STARTS
TO APPROACH HIM)
SHEPHERD
(EDGING OFF) Ba-a-a
43.
